candies.name: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies (20 pieces)
candies.description: A chocolate chip cookie is a drop cookie that features chocolate chips or chocolate morsels as its istinguishing ingredient. Chocolate chip cookies originated in the US about 1938.

candies.name: Candy Canes (12 pieces)
candies.description: Enjoy the classic holiday flavor of Brachs Peppermint Candy Canes - the original candy cane! Now available year-round. Perfect for home or office.

candies.name: Moist Chocolate Muffins (4 pieces)
candies.description: These tasty chocolate muffins are scrumptious! Yogurt in the batter keeps them super moist while cocoa powder and chocolate chips add a huge dose of chocolaty goodness.

candies.name: Christmas Tree Lolipops (10 piesces)
candies.description: Great for Holiday Gifts. Great stocking stuffers

candies.name: Fruit Slices Candy (25 pieces)
candies.description: Fruit slices gummies are a fabulous treat that comes in many exciting flavors! If you love chewy gummy candy but want more options when it comes to taste, this is a must-try.

candies.name: Fruit Jelly Candy (40 pieces)
candies.description: Candy lovers of all ages really dig this mix of oversized jellies! Giant jellies are a real hit at birthday parties and candy buffets, as well as toppers for your favorite crafts (think gingerbread houses) and desserts!
